source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Watercolor Painting Techniques and Follow Along Projects
items.headline: Learn basics of watercolors; How to mix colors and and create color variations. Create paintings using the learnt theory
objectives_summary: Basics of Water colors
Characteristics and properties of Watercolor
Techniques and Applications

items.title: Painting watercolour with Kathy Karas- Curvaceous Pears
items.headline: Take your painting skills from meh to magic
objectives_summary: How to paint these curvaceous pears with step by step tutorial by Kathy karas
Be amazed as you learn Kathy's techniques

items.title: Introduction to Nuno Felt: Autumn Leaves Nuno Felted Scarf

visible_instructors.name: Lena
visible_instructors.job_title: Keep felting, keep discovering and keep creating.

items.headline: Feltmaking
objectives_summary: Students will learn nuno felting technique, i.e. felt on silk
Wet feltmaking

items.title: Expressionism Abstract Acrylic Art Painting 3D
items.headline: " Waves Passion Storm"
objectives_summary: Create your own painting in one lesson
Understanding Abstract Art
Do And Dont's of Abstract Art

items.title: Realistic Colored Pencil Drawing: Drawing Lips & Brush

visible_instructors.name: Homa
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.title: Homa Tayefeh

visible_instructors.name: Matin
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei

items.headline: Learn How to Draw Realistic Lips & Brush with Colored Pencil. Drawing and Sketching with Colored Pencil  is a Cool Art
objectives_summary: students are expected to get acquainted with how to volume and texturing the lips in the colored pencil technique and gain experience in creating skin color, as well as how to create a metal piece in sketching a brush and its hair texture.
In this pencil drawing course, intermediate and advanced students will learn how to draw lips and a brush, learn how to make volume and color it, and enjoy drawing in great detail.

items.title: Country Jar Acrylic Painting Lesson
items.headline: a step by step acrylic lesson!
objectives_summary: how to make a colorful and bright acrylic painting

items.title: How To Plan Awesome Watercolor Artwork

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Four Step Approach To Get Amazing Results
objectives_summary: Four Step Process For Planning Awesome Art
How To Develop A Solid Point Of Interest, Or 'Why'
Composition Basics And Common Errors To Avoid

items.title: Sewing skills for bag-making. Sew the Canterbury Zipper Bag
items.headline: Learn to sew binding and a trimmed zipper. FREE sewing pattern included in two sizes.
objectives_summary: Tips for sewing with a 1/4 inch seam allowance
Use of basting tape or fabric glue for sewing zippers
Sewing a trimmed zipper

items.title: Yellow Iris in Watercolor
items.headline: Flowers in Watercolor. Wet-on-Wet Watercolor technique
objectives_summary: You will get how to paint Yellow Iris in Watercolor

items.title: Learn to Make Realistic 3D Elephant cake

visible_instructors.title: Eva Klinc Puric
visible_instructors.name: Eva Klinc
visible_instructors.job_title: Cake Artist and Instructor at Sugar Queen Academy

items.headline: Master the art of making amazing 3D cakes you can proudly show to the world and get the attention you deserve
objectives_summary: Learn the secrets to making 3D masterpieces made out of a real cake
How to plan and construct demanding 3D cakes
Which recipes to use for making 3D cakes

items.title: Master Copy Painting in Oil or Acrylic

visible_instructors.title: Viktoria Majestic
visible_instructors.name: Viktoria
visible_instructors.job_title: Painting Instructor & Award Winning Fine Artist

items.headline: Learn How to Paint a Still Life from start to finish with Copper, Glass and Peppers
objectives_summary: Painting a  still life Master Copy of Emil Carlsen's painting in Oil or Acrylic

items.title: Learn to Paint easy Watercolor blending & Polaroid Paintings
items.headline: Learn beginner watercolor techniques to paint 8 different paintings with different background & foreground painting tips
objectives_summary: You will learn to paint different watercolor Polaroid Paintings. Each process will be guided slowly step by step. You will get to learn different background painting techniques and design elements.

items.title: Marbles in colored pencils on drafting film
items.headline: create your masterpiece with colored pencils on drafting film!
objectives_summary: You will learn to create those beautiful marbles in colored pencils on drafting film

items.title: Watercolor Painting Magpie birds; best techniques to success
items.headline: Step-by-step guidance and top tips to create your own beautiful bird art with watercolour; beginners, all levels
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint some beautiful magpies using watercolours; master a range of watercolor techniques through learning by 'watching' and 'doing'
Paint feathers, a bird's eye, shadows, backgrounds, layer colour, apply glazes, soften hard edges, overlap large washes, create texture, use masking.
Use colour creatively; use blended colour washes to make your paintings glow; add layers of colour to create depth, shape and shading.

items.title: Hairstyle Drawing with Pencil- How to Draw Different Hair

visible_instructors.name: Homa
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist

visible_instructors.name: Matin

visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei

items.headline: Drawing Different Hair with Pencil, Suitable for Character Drawing, Hair Drawing. How to Draw Different Hair
objectives_summary: The students will get acquainted with the methods of sketching different types of hairstyles for men and women,
Short and long,
And different styles of straight, wavy, and curly.

items.title: Wedding Floral Jewelry
items.headline: Floral Jewelry
objectives_summary: Make beautiful earrings, necklaces, and bracelets using paper,tikka ,finger rings   to wear, give, or sell!
Learn to make several pairs of earrings, bracelets, and necklaces with variations on each style.
Unlimited lifetime access from anywhere in the world!
